overview: Back in June 2019, Brad flew to the UK to join Scottish masters of chaos Frontierer on a three-week tour of Europe and the UK. The band commissioned him to film a mini-documentary after connecting through Brad’s shout outs of the band. He loves their technical metal, which blends mathcore cacophony with djent’s downtuned bludgeoning tones for a progressive metal sound layered with electronics. Follow the band’s journey from forming across an ocean with no intent to ever play a show to releasing multiple albums and blowing minds on a self-booked 19-day “megathon” tour…it’s ‘A Trail of Noise.’
title: A Trail Of Noise
